column1: To make this easier on you and myself each weapon will be covered over two lines, the top line is the PvE perks, the bottom will be PvP. Hope that makes sense.
The way this works is all primary ammo weapons (white bricks) are first, then special ammo weapons (green bricks), then finally power weapons
Note: perks are displayed in the order of importance
